Package index

Acquire data

compile_acs_data()
Analysis-ready social science measures
calculate_segregation_metrics()
Calculate segregation at multiple geographies

Measuring error

se_simple()
Calculate a simple standard error
se_sum()
Calculate a pooled standard error for a summed or subtracted estimate
se_proportion_ratio()
Calculate a pooled standard error for a proportion or ratio
cv()
Calculate a coefficient of variation
calculate_cvs()
Calculate coefficients of variation

Document data

generate_codebook()
Document variables from compile_acs_data()

Helper functions

safe_divide()
Division without NAs
select_variables_by_name()
Easily rename ACS variables
filter_variables()
Easily filter ACS variables
list_acs_variables()
Return ACS variables codes and names
make_pretty_names()
Pretty-ify variable names
